title: Preparation and application of alkali-activated cementitious materials in solidification/stabilization of chromite ore processing residue
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19912-19921
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01270D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Pengyue Su, Pan Zhao, Hao Wang, Kun Zhou, Yicheng Guo, Sha Liu, Huicheng Lu, Haiyu Chen, Lanjun Zhang, Ziqiang He, Ming Xia, Shujie Zhao
Solidification/stabilization (S/S) of COPR was carried out by using blast furnace slag (BFS) and fly ash (FA) to prepare alkali-activated cementitious materials (AACM).
